name: Rolling Ball (TripleA2264)
description:
A simple platformer that was originally inspired by this project on scratch, so credit towards AwesomeGameDeveloper since this game wouldn't exist without them.

After putting my own spin on the project on scratch and adding a few levels, a couple years later I decided to remake it from the ground up in unity, building more levels, adding cleaner graphics, particles effects and a full side scrolling level.

WARNING: STILL IN EARLY DEVOLPMENT AND CONTAINS BUGS
